title: Galaxy Agrico Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 0.75 crore, up 0.95% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Galaxy Agrico Exports are:Net Sales at Rs 0.75 crore in December 2025 up 0.95% from Rs. 0.74 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 5.31 crore in December 2025 up 6372.28% from Rs. 0.08 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands negative at Rs. 0.34 crore in December 2025 down 750% from Rs. 0.04 crore in December 2024. Galaxy Agrico EPS has increased to Rs. 19.46 in December 2025 from Rs. 0.31 in December 2024. Galaxy Agrico shares closed at 60.50 on January 12, 2026 (BSE) and has given 16.35% returns over the last 6 months and 49.86% over the last 12 months.
